```{r}
df <- read_excel("../data/nba_stats_full24-25.xlsx")
head(df)
# data 24-25 regular season

```



```{r}
keep <- c("Team","GP","W","L","WIN%","PTS",
          "FG%","eFG%","TS%","TOV%","OREB%","DREB%",
          "PACE","POSS","OffRtg","DefRtg","NetRtg",
          "AST","STL","BLK","PF","REB")
df <- df[, intersect(keep, names(df))]

df <- tidyr::drop_na(df)

#team to factor, convert the rest to numerical values
df$Team <- as.factor(df$Team)
df[] <- lapply(df, function(x) if(is.character(x)) suppressWarnings(as.numeric(x)) else x)

```
